title: Christ Evangelical English Lutheran Church
text:
Christ Evangelical English Lutheran Church, also known as Rugged Cross Baptist Church, is a historic <a href="Evangelical%20Lutheran%20Church%20in%20America">Evangelical Lutheran</a> <a href="Church%20%28building%29">church</a> at 1084 Lafayette Avenue, 11221, in <a href="Bedford-Stuyvesant%2C%20Brooklyn">Bedford-Stuyvesant, Brooklyn</a>, <a href="New%20York%20City">New York, New York</a>. It was built in 1898–1899 in the <a href="Romanesque%20Revival%20architecture">Romanesque Revival</a> style. It is faced in cream colored brick with beige brick and <a href="terra%20cotta">terra cotta</a> trim. The front facade is arranged with a two story tall central gable flanked by asymmetrical towers.
It was listed on the <a href="National%20Register%20of%20Historic%20Places">National Register of Historic Places</a> in 2007.
